Description:
Lead end-to-end project management efforts, including planning, execution, monitoring, and successful delivery.
Foster collaborative relationships with clients, taking on an Account - Manager role to understand their requirements and maintain a high level of customer satisfaction.
Collaborate closely with our pre-sales team to develop project proposals, offering insights and recommendations that align with client goals.
Utilize your pre-sales acumen to contribute to solution design, ensuring technical feasibility and alignment with client needs.
Effectively communicate project progress, timelines, and potential roadblocks to stakeholders, both internal and external.
Drive cross-functional teams, harnessing the strengths of diverse departments to achieve project milestones.
Employ agile methodologies where applicable to enhance project efficiency and adaptability.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in a relevant field.
5-7 years of proven project management experience.
Experience in the telecom or network sector.
Ability to handle mega projects.
Demonstrated success in client-facing roles such as Account Management.
Proficiency in pre-sales activities, including proposal development and solution design.
Strong organizational and communication skills.
Ability to lead cross-functional teams and inspire collaboration.
PMP, PRINCE2, or equivalent project management certification is a plus.
Fluent in English and Arabic.
